explains: n. 问答教学法；教义问答书

sentences.en: The answer may be found in our smallest catechism .
sentences.cn: 答案可能会发现，在迄今为止最小的讲授。

sentences.en: The catechism is important for at least three reasons.
sentences.cn: 该问答是很重要的，至少有三个理由。

sentences.en: English children have their own particular catechism of accepted conduct to learn.
sentences.cn: 英国的儿童需要学习他们独特的行为规范基本准则。
